attributes.action: Say no to 2nd EU Referendum the vote was decided.
attributes.additional_details: If we cannot except the vote and its result then why hold a referendum in the first place. Lets honour our principles and state forever that the final vote is exactly what it is. Final.
attributes.background: After this massive decision in the EU Referendum the vote was conclusive. Over 50% voted out and won fair we cant keep going back and forth over this result. Let's just except what is and get this great country and its people back together and start moving forward.
